entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
